attributes.action: Stop the building of a multi-million pound mosque at the olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are plans to plans to build a multi million pound mosque at the Olympic Games site. The Olympic games are not about religion.I disagree with the building of the Mosque. If there is to be any religious building, then it must be multi-cultural, to allow for worship by all faiths, be it christian, buddist, jewish, muslim or other.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
